Character.Description: A highly competent, focused woman coder

Style.Rendering: High-detail digital painting, photorealistic, concept art quality

ColorPalette.Treatment: High saturation, strong contrast between warm neons and cool tech light

Atmosphere.Mood: Mysterious, electric, high-stakes, gritty yet stylish

Situations.Name: Urban Vigilante Portrait
Situations.Camera: Close-up, 3/4 profile, shallow depth of field

CharacterPose.BodyPosition: Static pose, standing tall, shoulders squared
CharacterPose.Gesture: Arms relaxed at sides or one hand near collar

Props.Name: Futuristic sunglasses
Props.Description: Sleek, angular frames with reflective or holographic lenses
Props.Application: Worn, neon reflections visible in lenses

Props.Name: Leather coat
Props.Description: Dark leather with high collar, tactical styling
Props.Application: Worn, collar turned up against wind

Situations.Name: Corporate Tech Expert
Situations.Setting: Clean server room or professional workspace with multi-monitor setup

CharacterPose.BodyPosition: Seated, leaning slightly forward toward screens

Props.Name: Professional glasses
Props.Description: Modern rectangular frames, subtle tech integration
Props.Application: Worn, screen reflections visible in lenses

Props.Name: Multi-monitor array
Props.Description: Multiple displays showing code, data visualizations

KeyDetails: Screen light illuminating face and hands
Situations.LightingFocus: Soft screen glow as primary light, low ambient

Situations.Name: Neon Cityscape Hacker
Situations.Setting: High-rise interior with window view onto neon-lit city street
Situations.Camera: Mid-shot, slightly low angle, showing cityscape scale

CharacterPose.BodyPosition: Seated or perched, slight forward lean
CharacterPose.Gesture: Focused coding/hacking on dual monitors, fingers hovering over keys

Props.Name: Cyber implants
Props.Description: Subtle neural interface ports or glowing temple implants
Props.Application: Visible near temples, faint glow matching screen colors

Props.Name: Dual monitors
Props.Application: Positioned in front of subject, contrasting with neon background

Props.Name: Coffee mug
Props.Description: Dark mug with subtle tech company logo or glowing elements
Props.Application: Set aside on desk, steam rising

KeyDetails: Vertical city signs visible through window
Contrast between warm neon exterior and cool screen light
Situations.LightingFocus: Strong saturated neon from background, contrasting screen light
